articles.title: Emmerdale star Michelle Hardwick confirms she is pregnant and expecting a baby with wife Kate Brooks - Daily Mail
articles.description: The soap actress, 44, is expecting a baby with her wife, Emmerdale producer Kate Brooks, and revealed she is due to give birth to their first child in October, later this year.
articles.content:
Emmerdale star Michelle Hardwick has confirmed she is pregnant. 
The actress, 44, who plays Vanessa Woodfield in the ITV soap, shared her exciting news via Instagram on Monday while debuting her growing baby bump.
